name: medicationdb
description: A simple medication management database with HAPI and ES6.

scripts.build-linux: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && yarn add nan && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v57-linux-x64/ && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.36.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v57-linux-x64
scripts.build-windows: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && yarn add nan && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v57-win32-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.36.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v57-win32-x64

author: Daniel Vigh <vighd@digital.co.hu>
